definition: branch/stem/stalk/CL:根[gen1]/to block/to hinder/(Tw) interesting, fresh, or amusing subject matter or scenario

sentences.english: What God looks on as obstinate weakness, we call strength.
sentences.chinese: 神看作頑梗的軟弱，我們卻稱之爲力量。

sentences.english: No longer will they follow the stubbornness of their evil hearts.
sentences.chinese: 他們必不再隨從自己頑梗的噁心行事。

sentences.english: Ask God to protect your marriage from the damage caused by stubborn or rebellious hearts.
sentences.chinese: 求神保護你們婚姻不受到頑梗和反叛的心的破壞。

sentences.english: One was obstinate , the others obedient.
sentences.chinese: 一個是頑梗，另兩個是順服。

sentences.english: Pray about hardness of heart that causes love to die.
sentences.chinese: 爲導致愛消失的頑梗的心禱告。

sentences.english: Confess any hardness of heart you have toward God or your spouse as sin.
sentences.chinese: 承認任何對上帝，對你愛人持頑梗的心都是罪。

sentences.english: Come to know the consequences of rebellion will bring severe judgment from God.
sentences.chinese: 認識頑梗背逆的結果，必定招徠神嚴厲的審判。
